CustomField.description: Is this Direct Debit a First or Recurring.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( cpm__Custom_Sequence_Type__c ) ) , cpm__Custom_Sequence_Type__c , IF ( cpm__Mandate__r.cpm__Use_Last_on_next_run__c , "FNAL", IF ( cpm__Mandate__r.cpm__Use_First_on_next_run__c , "FRST", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL ( cpm__Mandate__r.cpm__Type__c, 'Recurring') , NOT(ISBLANK(cpm__Mandate__r.cpm__Last_Used__c)) ) , "RCUR" , IF ( OR ( ISPICKVAL( cpm__Mandate__r.cpm__Type__c, 'One-Off') , ISPICKVAL(cpm__Mandate__r.cpm__Type__c, 'Eenmalig') ) , "OOFF" , "FRST" ) ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is this Direct Debit a First or Recurring.
CustomField.label: Sequence Type
